body.name: joy Womens Razor Blade Refills, 12 Count, Purple, Lubrastrip to Help Avoid Skin Irritation
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: SMOOTH SKIN: the joy razor has 5 cutting blades, designed to resist rust, for a comfortable, close shave and silky-smooth skin
PROTECT YOUR SKIN: the joy cartridge has a lubrastrip for glide while protecting skin from shave irritation
UP TO 22 USES: each refill cartridge delivers up to 22 comfortable close shaves per blade
CARTRIDGE COMPATIBILITY: every joy cartridge fits every joy handle, easily switch up the colors, the joy razor blades in this pack work with all joy handles
KIND TO THE PLANET & YOU: our razor is cruelty-free and dermatologist confirmed safe for all skin types
PIVOTING HEAD: the blade refill head moves up and down to shave any hair, anywhere
body.description: Bye hairs, hi smooth skin! meet our joy razor blade refills! Our cartridge boasts 5 sharp cutting blades and a protective lubrastrip to give you a close, comfortable shave for ultra smooth skin. How? The lubrastrip releases a luxurious formula which increases glide on the skin and protects you from irritation and pesky bumps. The joy razor reaches all your body spots (even the bikini line and that toe hair!) As the razor head pivots up and down, adjusting to your body’s natural contours. The joy cartridges are designed to deliver you LOTS of close and smooth shaves, at least 22 per refill (we like to be precise). What’s more, the joy razor blade refills work with every joy handle, so have fun mixing and matching colors — are you going to be team teal, pink, lavender or color-changing? Once you've made up your mind, the cartridge easily clicks into the top of the handle. To make things even better, all joy+glee products are cruelty free, PETA confirmed! attached your refill and now want to check you’re shaving with it correctly? Have a watch of our how-to videos to make your hair removal routine even easier.

reviews.reviewText: I hate to write a review about these. But, I will have to say I love these. I’m so sick of bad razors and blades. When I found these it was bliss. They actually shave. Don’t tell anyone because I’m afraid they will be hard to find because everyone will buy them.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great razor blades
reviews.reviewText: I love these razor blades! They are the best I have ever used. They give the smoothest shave! I gave it 4 stars because I think it is a little expensive for the number of blades you get.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unbelievable price for the quality!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. So I bought my original Joy razor at Walmart. I got it because there is five girls in my house and everyone was using the same exact razor. It doesn’t help when 4 of them would forget to take their razor out of the shower and then end up getting mixed up. Then the sisterly arguments ensued about it because they were buying their own blades and of course they are expensive. I bought 2 blue, 2pink, and 1 purple for myself. It ended the family feud. I was on Amazon one day looking for a specific eye brow pen and an ad for the razor refills popped up. My jaw hit the floor! At Walmart, for 4 razor refills it is a little over $9 for four of them. They also have an online seller that has the 12 pack but for $49.88!! The 8 pack is $33.88! Absolutely insane! I haven’t purchased them anywhere else since! Now Joy has Pink, Yellow, Teal Blue and Purple!! Too bad I didn’t look online for other color variations back then. One thing I know for sure is that the quality of the razor blade cannot be beat in my book. I’ve tried just about every one made, and I didn’t ever get the close, smooth shave I get with the Joy. First, a 5 blade razor is my go-to and while there are other razors that have 5 blades, they have so much bulk around the blades that you really are only using 4 because the 5th blade is tucked away under the lip of the head. So why bother. It’s to fancy up the lube strip, making it look appealing. It’s really a marketing tactic in my opinion. The joy is thin and streamlined. It is designed to use all 5 blades and for a seamless stroke. It also has a lubricant strip that allows for a sheer stroke over your skin. As long as I take it out of the shower and put it back in my box strip side up, I can get 5 shaves from one blade before the strip is no longer effective. However, I have also been in between shipments and used conditioner as a substitute shaving gel, and the blades went two more shaving rounds. Note , I am a blonde and GH Ave very thin fine hair so someone who has courser hair may not get as many shaves as I do, but I would bet the bank on at minimum getting 4. All in all, Joy is an excellent choice for a razor, and I am one happily shaven woman after finding this deal through Amazon!

reviews.reviewText: I love this razor and disposable ends. I have been using it for a long time. It works very well on course leg hair. Be careful you can cut yourself easily but it’s the best razor I have used ever!
Have used best men’s razors expensive….. found these, work better and much more economical. Try them! You’ll be happy that you did!
Good product love the joy razor blades
I have been using these for about 2 years now. I find that they don't shave as close as I would like, but they are economical. They don't irritate my skin and work well with a variety of shave gels.

I've been using these blades for years now and have never seen such an inferior product. The rubber looks to be dented and squished.I'd love to return the product but that requires a printer which I do not have. Complete waste of money and terrible experience.
